svg.style: background: transparent; background-color: transparent; color-scheme: light dark;

style="ellipse;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;aspect=fixed;fillColor=#fff2cc;strokeColor=#d6b656;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="140" y="480" width="80" height="80" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="q6Ej8HB-LPezsNlJYt9w-4" value="" style="endArrow=classic;html=1;rounded=0;entryX=0.5;entryY=0;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;exitX=0.5;exitY=1;exitDx=0;exitDy=0;" parent="1" source="q6Ej8HB-LPezsNlJYt9w-1" height="80" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="q6Ej8HB-LPezsNlJYt9w-8" value="" id="q6Ej8HB-LPezsNlJYt9w-24" value="返回数据" style="edgeLabel;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;resizable=0;points=[];" parent="q6Ej8HB-LPezsNlJYt9w-18" vertex="1" connectable="0"> <mxGeometry x="0.0038" y="1" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint y="45" as="offset" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="q6Ej8HB-LPezsNlJYt9w-25" value="" style="endArrow=classic;html=1;rounded=0;entryX=0.25;entryY=1;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;exitX=0.5;exitY=0;exitDx=0;exitDy=0;" parent="1" source="q6Ej8HB-LPezsNlJYt9w-6" target="q6Ej8HB-LPezsNlJYt9w-2" edge="1"> <mxGeometry width="50" height="50" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="450" y="350" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="500" y="300" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="q6Ej8HB-LPezsNlJYt9w-26" value="不允许，告知 Leader 地址" style="edgeLabel;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;resizable=0;points=[];" parent="q6Ej8HB-LPezsNlJYt9w-25" vertex="1" connectable="0"> <mxGeometry x="0.0209" y="1" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="1" y="-13" as="offset" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="q6Ej8HB-LPezsNlJYt9w-27" value="" style="endArrow=classic;html=1;rounded=0;entryX=0.713;entryY=0.02;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;entryPerimeter=0;exitX=0;exitY=0.25;exitDx=0;exitDy=0;" parent="1" source="q6Ej8HB-LPezsNlJYt9w-2" target="q6Ej8HB-LPezsNlJYt9w-3" edge="1"> <mxGeometry width="50" height="50" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="450" y="350" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="500" y="300" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="q6Ej8HB-LPezsNlJYt9w-28" value="写" style="edgeLabel;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;resizable=0;points=[];" parent="q6Ej8HB-LPezsNlJYt9w-27" vertex="1" connectable="0"> <mxGeometry x="0.0516" y="-1" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint as="offset" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="q6Ej8HB-LPezsNlJYt9w-29" value="" style="endArrow=classic;html=1;rounded=0;entryX=0.013;entryY=0.607;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;entryPerimeter=0;exitX=1;exitY=0;exitDx=0;exitDy=0;" parent="1" source="q6Ej8HB-LPezsNlJYt9w-3" target="q6Ej8HB-LPezsNlJYt9w-2" edge="1"> <mxGeometry width="50" height="50" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="450" y="350" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="500" y="300" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="q6Ej8HB-LPezsNlJYt9w-30" value="通过" style="edgeLabel;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;resizable=0;points=[];" parent="q6Ej8HB-LPezsNlJYt9w-29" vertex="1" connectable="0"> <mxGeometry x="0.0048" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint as="offset" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="q6Ej8HB-LPezsNlJYt9w-31" value="<h1 style="margin-top: 0px;">工作流程</h1><p>1. 只有 Leader 可写，当用户向 Leader 写入数据后 Leader 会向各个节点发送日志以同步数据。</p><p>2. 如果客户端向 Follower 写入，会遭到拒绝并得到 Leader 的地址，客户端要记录 Leader 地址之后的写入都向 Leader 写入。</p><p>3. Follower 做为只读节点。</p>" style="text;html=1;whiteSpace=wrap;overflow=hidden;rounded=0;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="120" y="40" width="560" height="130" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="xgTbJTmZf5oHDnO3PAFn-1" value="<h1 style="margin-top: 0px;">术语</h1><p>Append Entries：心跳，同步日志。由 Leader 主动发出，用于同步日志给 Follower 和告知自身有效性。</p>" style="text;html=1;whiteSpace=wrap;overflow=hidden;rounded=0;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="120" y="640" width="650" height="200" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> </root> </mxGraphModel> </diagram> </mxfile>

div.div: 不允许，告知 Leader 地址

switch.text: 不允许，告知 Leader 地址

div.p: 1. 只有 Leader 可写，当用户向 Leader 写入数据后 Leader 会向各个节点发送日志以同步数据。
2. 如果客户端向 Follower 写入，会遭到拒绝并得到 Leader 的地址，客户端要记录 Leader 地址之后的写入都向 Leader 写入。

switch.text: 工作流程1. 只有 Leader 可写，当用户向 Leader 写入数据后 Leader 会向各个节点发送日志以同步数据。...

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 648px; height: 1px; padding-top: 607px; margin-left: 2px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: left; max-height: 196px; overflow: hidden; color: #000000;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;
div.p: Append Entries：心跳，同步日志。由 Leader 主动发出，用于同步日志给 Follower 和告知自身有效性。

switch.text: 术语 Append Entries：心跳，同步日志。由 Leader 主动发出，用于同步日志给 Follower 和告知自身有效性。

a.text: Text is not SVG - cannot display
